text: daivadutane dhikkaricc yud'dhattilninn pinmari vittilirunnatil ‎santeasikkunnavaranavar. tannalute dhanankeantum dehankeantum ‎daivamargttil samaram ceyyunnat avarkk anistakaramayi. ‎avarinnane parayukayum ceytu: "i keatuncutil ninnal ‎yud'dhattinirannippurappetenta.” parayuka: narakatti kututal ‎cuteriyatan. avar beadhavanmarayirunnenkil etra nannayene. ‎
